section.title: DEV YAML configuration
section.para: The contribution of the proxy1 instance to the puppet-dmsat1 RPM is a set of parameters, distributed over different YAML files. Each time the set of parameters is changed, we need to build a new version of the puppet-dmsat1 RPM. This is also true if other platforms, or subzones, are added to the dmsat1 Deployment zone.

The influence of proxy1 to the YAML fileset of dmsat1 is depicted below.
&t1p; cd /root/puppet-dmsat1/puppet-dmsat1/var/lib/hiera &t1p; ./depzone_platform_instance.sh -d dmsat1 -h proxy1.rmt.dmsat1.org -i proxy1 -p proxy depzones/dmsat1/hosts/proxy1.rmt.dmsat1.org.yaml (node) depzones/dmsat1.yaml (depzone) base.yaml (base)

The code of the puppet-dmsat1 RPM can be found in . The RPM is built with:
&t1p; cd ~/puppet-dmsat1 &t1p; ./build.sh .. output skipped .. &t1p; rpm --resign /root/rpm/RPMS/noarch/puppet-dmsat1-0.1.1-1.noarch.rpm Enter pass phrase: redhat Pass phrase is good. /root/rpm/RPMS/noarch/puppet-dmsat1-0.1.1-1.noarch.rpm: &t1p; scp /root/rpm/RPMS/noarch/puppet-dmsat1-0.1.1-1.noarch.rpm root@192.168.5.11:/tmp root@192.168.5.11's password: redhat puppet-dmsat1-0.1.1-1.noarch.rpm 100% 8743 8.5KB/s 00:00
